accurate to about five to ten meters on on smartphones so you're getting in an approximate position of where you are
that's not really good enough to place things accurately where where you think
something is is going to be different for me so it makes it hard to collaborate and position things
accurately in the real world and you also get a lot of interference from tall buildings and bridges and trees because

and you'll actually be a block away but uh you won't know that you can improve uh the accuracy of GPS
with something called differential DPS and this is used for things like surveying and agriculture where you
really need accurate where am I in the real world and this is where you have a
ground station that is at a known place in the world and it's basically giving you Correctional data to the DPS
receivers in the local area saying okay I know you think you're at this position but I know uh from the data that I'm
receiving that you're actually going to be you know at some meters this way and so using that method you can get down to
8 to 15 millimeters accuracy but that requires special Hardware so it's not really a scalable solution for
the metaverse uh Wi-Fi and Bluetooth beacons are also methods that people use to try and
locate themselves in the real world Wi-Fi is also very approximate 5 to 15 meters indoors 20 meters Outdoors
Bluetooth beacons can be more accurate you can get down to like two meters accuracy if you have multiple beacons but you have to have a lot of beacons
because even though they have large theoretical ranges um with a no obstructions

area to get down to two meters accuracy and then you can go the other way so

mapping a 3D space and also working out your location within that space so
